indexterm.see: ISO Entity Sets, Added Math Symbols: Delimiters

refmeta.refentrytitle: Added Math Symbols: Delimiters Character Entities (%isoamsc;)

refnamediv.refpurpose: Added Math Symbols: Delimiters Character Entities

refsynopsisdiv.para:
The %isoamsc; parameter entity includes the ISO character entities with the public identifier:
ISO 8879:1986//ENTITIES Added Math Symbols: Delimiters//EN
